Texts.Chs: 现在，你已经有了许多蜂箱，以及蜜蜂，森林蜜蜂等。我在想：如果把^orange;森林蜂后^reset;和^orange;普通雄蜂^reset;放在^orange;大型蜂箱^reset;会发生什么？得到^green;蜂后^reset;。是的最终目的。
Texts.Eng: So, you've got apiaries, honey bees and forest bees. Now, I wonder: what would happen if you put a ^orange;Forest Queen^reset; and some ^orange;Honey Drones^reset; into that ^orange;Giant Apiary^reset;? The resulting ^green;queen^reset; is your goal.

Texts.Chs: 你可以将类似的方法用到一些蜜蜂品种上，来创造更多新的蜜蜂品种。但^orange;不是所有蜜蜂^reset;都可以杂交成功。你需要大量的实验才能找出规律。
Texts.Eng: You can create numerous types of bees using a similar method with other strains. ^red;Not all bees^reset; can be bred with every family-type. You'll need to experiment yourself to find out what works.
